phrases.original: Applies only to evangelists, church administrators, Web deacons and similar roles. Must have responsibilities that pertain to an entire congregation.
phrases.translated: Applies only to evangelists, church administrators, Web deacons and similar roles. Must have responsibilities that pertain to an entire congregation.

phrases.original: Can pre-authorize any disciples within his congregation to register for the Invites App
phrases.translated: Can pre-authorize any disciples within his congregation to register for the Invites App

phrases.original: Can pre-authorize any disciples within her congregation to register for the Invites App
phrases.translated: Can pre-authorize any disciples within her congregation to register for the Invites App

phrases.original: Can delegate pre-authorization to leaders within his ministry
phrases.translated: Can delegate pre-authorization to leaders within his ministry

phrases.original: Can delegate pre-authorization to leaders within the ministry that she co-leads
phrases.translated: Can delegate pre-authorization to leaders within the ministry that she co-leads

phrases.original: All users must be authorized before they can use the Invites App. This is for security purposes, and it ensures that every registered user is also a member in good standing with the International Christian Churches.
phrases.translated: All users must be authorized before they can use the Invites App. This is for security purposes, and it ensures that every registered user is also a member in good standing with the International Christian Churches.

phrases.original: You can get more disciples to use the Invites App by allowing {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} to pre-authorize them to register.
phrases.translated: You can get more disciples to use the Invites App by allowing {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} to pre-authorize them to register.

phrases.original: You can get more disciples to use the Invites App by allowing {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} to pre-authorize them to register (both male and female).
phrases.translated: You can get more disciples to use the Invites App by allowing {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} to pre-authorize them to register (both male and female).

phrases.original: This setting is ideal for anyone who leads, or has led, a Bible Talk.
phrases.translated: This setting is ideal for anyone who leads, or has led, a Bible Talk.

phrases.original: If {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} leads a house church or higher, select this option.
phrases.translated: If {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} leads a house church or higher, select this option.

phrases.original: If {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} is a Women's Ministry Leader, or co-leads a house church (or higher), select this option.
phrases.translated: If {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} is a Women's Ministry Leader, or co-leads a house church (or higher), select this option.

phrases.original: By allowing him to pre-authorize the leaders that serve under him, you can leverage the power of delegation to quickly get all of his people to begin using the Invites App.
phrases.translated: By allowing him to pre-authorize the leaders that serve under him, you can leverage the power of delegation to quickly get all of his people to begin using the Invites App.

phrases.original: By allowing her to pre-authorize the leaders who are in the group that she co-leads (whether male or female), you can leverage the power of delegation to quickly get disciples at all levels within her group to begin using the Invites App.
phrases.translated: By allowing her to pre-authorize the leaders who are in the group that she co-leads (whether male or female), you can leverage the power of delegation to quickly get disciples at all levels within her group to begin using the Invites App.

phrases.original: Note: delegating pre-authorization not only delegates to one person directly, but also passes on the ability to delegate. It is a powerful setting that is only meant to be enabled for leaders of leaders (specifically, house church leaders or higher).
phrases.translated: Note: delegating pre-authorization not only delegates to one person directly, but also passes on the ability to delegate. It is a powerful setting that is only meant to be enabled for leaders of leaders (specifically, house church leaders or higher).

phrases.original: The first name must not exceed 255 characters.
phrases.translated: The first name must not exceed 255 characters.

phrases.original: The last name must not exceed 255 characters.
phrases.translated: The last name must not exceed 255 characters.

phrases.original: The e-mail address must not exceed 255 characters.
phrases.translated: The e-mail address must not exceed 255 characters.

phrases.original: Please check the e-mail address for accuracy and proper formatting.
phrases.translated: Please check the e-mail address for accuracy and proper formatting.

phrases.original: Another user is already using that e-mail address.
phrases.translated: Another user is already using that e-mail address.

phrases.original: The user type for this user cannot be downgraded.
phrases.translated: The user type for this user cannot be downgraded.

phrases.original: The user status for this user cannot be downgraded.
phrases.translated: The user status for this user cannot be downgraded.

phrases.original: You do not have sufficient permissions to prevent this user from pre-authorizing disciples to become new users.
phrases.translated: You do not have sufficient permissions to prevent this user from pre-authorizing disciples to become new users.

phrases.original: You do not have sufficient permissions to prevent this user from delegating pre-authorization to other leaders.
phrases.translated: You do not have sufficient permissions to prevent this user from delegating pre-authorization to other leaders.

phrases.original: Admins cannot downgrade the user type of their own account.
phrases.translated: Admins cannot downgrade the user type of their own account.

phrases.original: Admins cannot downgrade their own account status.
phrases.translated: Admins cannot downgrade their own account status.

phrases.original: Admins cannot turn off the setting on their own account that allows them to pre-authorize disciples to become new users.
phrases.translated: Admins cannot turn off the setting on their own account that allows them to pre-authorize disciples to become new users.

phrases.original: Admins cannot turn off the setting on their own account that allows them to delegate pre-authorization to other leaders.
phrases.translated: Admins cannot turn off the setting on their own account that allows them to delegate pre-authorization to other leaders.

phrases.original: You cannot modify a user from a different congregation.
phrases.translated: You cannot modify a user from a different congregation.

phrases.original: No changes to this user have been made, and so no settings were updated.
phrases.translated: No changes to this user have been made, and so no settings were updated.

phrases.original: An unexpected error occurred. Please ensure that you are connected to the internet, and perhaps try again.
phrases.translated: An unexpected error occurred. Please ensure that you are connected to the internet, and perhaps try again.
